prompt:
The dealer slipped a small bag of cocaine into the buyer's hand during the tense alley exchange.
After snorting a line of cocaine, she felt an electric rush surge through her veins, sharpening her senses to a razor edge.
He owed thousands to the cartel for the cocaine shipment that vanished in a botched smuggling run.
Cocaine addiction had turned his once-promising career into a nightmare of paranoia and debt.
In the dimly lit club, revelers passed around a mirror dusted with cocaine, laughing as the high kicked in.
The undercover cop posed as a junkie to infiltrate the cocaine ring operating out of the warehouse.
She cut the cocaine with baking soda to stretch her supply, knowing it would disappoint her desperate clients.
Cocaine-fueled binges left him crashing hard, sweating and twitching on the motel room floor.
The kingpin's empire crumbled when federal agents seized tons of cocaine hidden in fruit shipments.
He traded his wedding ring for a gram of cocaine, chasing the fleeting euphoria one more time.
